title: Need Help Identifying This Font Type
content:
Please help us identify what font type/family is being used to create this logo (see Attached). I've researched a lot of sans serif fonts but can't seem to locate this example (particularly the way the "R" is somewhat low profile, etc.).

Here is what I've researched so far:  
Verlag  
Adrianna Extended  
Stereo Gothic  
FF Clan OT Extd Thin

Thank you.

Gregory

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015180016im_/http:/cdn.framednetwork.com/site/images/dock_framed_tab.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [dock\_framed\_tab.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015180016/http:/typophile.com/files/dock_framed_tab.png) | 8.69 KB |
author: goxmedia

comments.content: ... dude, I think you nailed it! Thanks!
